titleStmt.title: The father's new-years-gift to his son containing divers useful and necessary directions how to order himself both in respect to this life and that which is to come / written by the Right Honourable Sir Matthew Hale ; whereunto is added, divine poems upon Christmas-day.
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
